==Japanese==
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Doll}}
[[File:Hinamatsuri16.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|人形}} (''ningyō'', ''hitogata''): a '''[[doll]]''' for [[Hina matsuri]].]]
</div>

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|にん|ぎょう}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=にんぎょう}} compound {{m|zh|人形|tr=nyin heng|lit=person shape}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|にんぎょう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|にんぎょう|hhira=にんぎやう}}

# [[doll]], [[puppet]]
# a [[picture]] of someone's [[appearance]]
# a [[figurative]] [[puppet]], such as someone who [[carry out|carries out]] actions for someone else
# {{qualifier|less common}} a [[tailor]]'s [[dummy]], a [[mannequin]]

=====Usage notes=====
For the general sense of {{m|en|doll}}, the ''ningyō'' reading appears to be more common.

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-r|人形家|にんぎょうか}}: a [[dollmaker]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kun|ひと|かた|k2=がた}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひとがた|人|tr1=hito|t1=person|形|tr2=kata|t2=shape, form}}. {{rendaku2|sort=ひとがた|kata|gata}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kun|ひとがた|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|人像}} {{qualifier|less common}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひとがた}}

# a [[human]] [[shape]]
# a [[doll]]
# a [[tailor]]'s [[dummy]], a [[mannequin]]
# a [[proxy]], a [[representative]]
# a person's [[appearance]]
# a [[description]] or [[sketch]] of a person, as in a [[wanted]] poster created by the [[police]]
